data.text: @TODAYshow @hodakotb Where are the voices of the adoptees? Conspicuously silent. I wish we could have a voice on #WorldAdoptionDay too
@TODAYshow @hodakotb Life just gets better every day with your little one. Seize every moment with her and enjoy the journey! They grow up so fast 💞

@TODAYshow @hodakotb My precious daughter that we adopted when she was a day old is now 20 years old, going to college and still living with her Mommy! She has been my world along with her older siblings! #worldadoptionday #MotherDaughter https://t.co/ShA6jOcabE
@TODAYshow @hodakotb Sooooo!! Sweet!! Beautiful! Heart warming moment!!😁😁🤗🤗❤❤
